description.narrative: This project stems from several questions mainly one: How to think of citizen participation in the debate on the constitution to improve the democratic life of the country considering many people have not even read the Chilean Constitution nor know its ori gin from the Pinochet dictatorship much less the way this document determines the life of the country and the people?The project aims therefore to develop a web platform that allows exploring the contents of the Chilean Constitution so as to encourage civi c participation and empowerment of citizens. These may tour the contents of the Constitution through a reading interface on line and a set of tools (definitions index visuals questions views etc.). In this way the project will contribute to recognizing the scope that the Constitution has in the life of the country thus contributing to the debate on the rights and obligations of citizens.
